Test Name: Glucose Challenge Test, 50 g/1 h (Gestational Diabetes Screen)
Purpose: To measure plasma glucose levels 1 hour after a 50 g oral glucose load for gestational diabetes screening.
Container: Sodium fluoride/potassium oxalate or lithium heparin tube
Equipment: Automated glucose analyzer (e.g., Roche/Hitachi Cobas C systems, Abbott Architect)
